text:
Struggling to catch odd ad performance trends? Export your LinkedIn/Meta/Google CSVs & ask ChatGPT to find non-obvious patterns, like high-click creatives that don’t convert or niche audiences delivering top leads. 
https://t.co/zjRdTBBcRO

#adanalytics #LLM https://t.co/ebPP2NqYx7

.@Grok Overview and Update -- is there biased baked in into systems ?!
https://t.co/hJi4Qvg12P

My kid talks to ChatGPT 4h a day. He asked for an emdash key. He pauses mid-sentence like he's buffering. He corrects my prompts in real life. I'm not raising a child. I’m raising a GPT. https://t.co/1NEpdEnlqy
